darkSouls:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
darkSouls:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

darkSouls:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
darkSouls:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
darkSouls:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

darkSouls:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
darkSouls:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

darkSouls:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
darkSouls:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !darkSouls:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

darkSouls:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
darkSouls:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !darkSouls:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

darkSouls:ArtoriasSword.NAME: Artorias Sword
darkSouls:ArtoriasSword.DESCRIPTION: Deals !D! Damage. NL Applies !M! Vulnerable. NL Gain !B! Energy.

darkSouls:FumeGreatsword.NAME: Fume Greatsword
darkSouls:FumeGreatsword.DESCRIPTION: Smashs for !D! Damage & !M! Vulnerable. NL Strength affects !B! times.

darkSouls:Bloodlust.NAME: Bloodlust
darkSouls:Bloodlust.DESCRIPTION: Deals !D! Damage. NL Applies !M! Bleed. NL Dexterity affects !B! times.

darkSouls:Falchion.NAME: Falchion
darkSouls:Falchion.DESCRIPTION: Deals !D! Damage. NL Applies !M! Poison. NL Infinitely usable. NL Costs more after using.
